title: Mentoring-Based Internship Design and Operational Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners are pre-interns preparing for social sciences internships, aiming to enhance workplace adaptability

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three mentoring communication strategies suitable for an internship environment
Learners can establish task scaffolding plans according to job difficulty levels

Learners will analyze three types of conflict situations (e.g., task distribution, communication issues) that may arise during internships, designing one resolution strategy per situation (including role allocation and communication strategies) that secures over 80% validity through peer evaluation.
Learners can develop feedback system evaluation criteria considering social contexts
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
